Package golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.persistence.repository

Interface MovieJpaRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<MovieEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MovieEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<MovieEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<MovieEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<MovieEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<MovieEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MovieEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface MovieJpaRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MovieEntity,Long>
Spring Data JPA Repository for MovieEntity. Provides database operations for movies.
Author:
Luis Generoso * @since 1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • findByWinnerTrue

      List<MovieEntity> findByWinnerTrue()
      Finds all movies that are winners.
      Returns:
      List of winning MovieEntity objects

    • findMaxId

      @Query("SELECT MAX(m.id) FROM MovieEntity m") Optional<Long> findMaxId()
      Gets the maximum ID from the database. Returns empty if no movies exist.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the maximum ID, or empty if no movies exist

    • findByTitleContainingIgnoreCase

      @Query("SELECT m FROM MovieEntity m WHERE LOWER(m.title) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\'))") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<MovieEntity> findByTitleContainingIgnoreCase(@Param("searchTerm") String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds movies by title containing the search term (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - Search term
      pageable - Pagination and sorting parameters
      Returns:
      Page of MovieEntity

    • findByYearContaining

      @Query("SELECT m FROM MovieEntity m WHERE CAST(m.year AS string) LIKE CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\')") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<MovieEntity> findByYearContaining(@Param("searchTerm") String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds movies by year matching the search term.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - Search term (will be converted to integer)
      pageable - Pagination and sorting parameters
      Returns:
      Page of MovieEntity

    • findByAllFieldsContaining

      @Query("SELECT m FROM MovieEntity m WHERE LOWER(m.title) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\')) OR LOWER(m.studios) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\')) OR LOWER(m.producers) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\')) OR CAST(m.year AS string) LIKE CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\') OR CAST(m.id AS string) LIKE CONCAT(\'%\', :searchTerm, \'%\')") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<MovieEntity> findByAllFieldsContaining(@Param("searchTerm") String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds movies by any field containing the search term (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - Search term
      pageable - Pagination and sorting parameters
      Returns:
      Page of MovieEntity
